item.title: Identification
item.description: Identification Alignment with Business Goals and Objectives The first and most import step for a CISSP is to understand the business. Review organizational vision and strategy FIRST. Look beyond IT – Risk is measured by the impact the risk has on the business, not on a particular system. In order for risk to be integrated into the enterprise, senior management must be supportive and involved. If management funds and supports the risk management process, we will have what we need to be successful.
